p: The increase of the concentrations of all storage proteins except albumins/globulins ( Table 4) after additional N fertilization clearly showed that this treatment had the expected effect. An increased content of gluten proteins is associated with improved technological properties (quality) of the flour. The HOSUT line and the CO 2 effects on the protein distribution confirmed earlier studies that looked at these effects separately ( HÃ¶gy et al., 2009 ; Saalbach et al., 2014 ).
